description.translate: Is'not because I'm drunk, yo're go'uing turelec me.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§7Jaja\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7C'pa parsk jui bourré, que tu vam'faire la lorame\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Is'not because I'm drunk, yo're go'uing turelec me.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7力§a1 §7速度§c-1 §7飽食§c-3 §7運§c-2\"}"]}}
